I'm about 5'1 100lbs and this harness has a huge amount of extra room and length to the straps. The holes stop several inches short of where I need them to and have to be folded back in on themselves to not be flopping around everywhere.  For people 120lbs+ I would imagine this harness fits perfectly and is super sexy, but it's making me feel like a child who got into my older sister's closet. Luckily I got this for a Halloween costume, and the material is cheap enough I imagine it will be fairly easy to punch extra holes in and modify to look less ridiculous on me.

评论概述: one size does not fit all
评论详情: I'm a small person, 5'2, 99 lbs. no way in hell I was gonna be able to wear this thing. a little confusing but not a deal breaker. material was fine. just feels like it was made for plus size people.

This doesn't have my confidence, while it hasn't fallen apart yet, I've only managed to wear it once and it isn't very good material. I'm not confident it will stay together, a few grommets came off and the material is a kind that has let me down numerous times in the past. Very disappointed in this item as I wanted to use it for so many outfits

absolutely garbage quality. Fell apart as soon as I opened it, rivets popping off left and right. Then I got a replacement which the window for that was 1 WEEK. And it ALSO FELL APART. Don’t buy. Amazon couldn’t do anything to help me with a refund either.

The Women High Waisted Belt Punk Rock Belts offer a bold and edgy accessory choice that adds a unique flair to your ensemble, earning a solid 4-star rating from me.  The high-waisted design and punk rock aesthetic make this belt a standout piece for those seeking to make a statement. It's clear that it's designed to be a festival body chain and rave accessory, perfectly suited for individuals looking to showcase their style at lively events.  However, I've assigned a 4-star rating due to the complexity mentioned. While the look is undoubtedly captivating, the intricacies of wearing and adjusting the belt might require some effort and time. This could potentially impact the ease of use, particularly for those who prefer more straightforward accessories.  In summary, the Women High Waisted Belt Punk Rock Belts provide an attention-grabbing and daring accessory choice for festivals and rave events. The high-waisted design and punk rock vibes make it a versatile statement piece. While the complexity of wearing it might require a bit more attention, the overall impact and unique aesthetic are commendable. A 4-star rating reflects its distinctive style and the consideration of its wearability complexities.
